body:
Comment 2: 
The language doesn't have this built in.

Typically you write a map of the structs you want to use this way, like:

var m = map[string]func() interface{} {
   "MyStruct1": func() interface{} { return new(MyStruct1) },
   "MyStruct2": func() interface{} { return new(MyStruct2) },
}

and then you do m[name]().
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
